@narfbg sorry mybad I get confused between this and other issue though both closed
What do you mean what to do? It's a bug report, obviously something doesn't work right.
This means, Is the $this obj suppose to have the cache obj? I am trying to fix this issue.
There's a pull request referenced above that contained a fix, object instances have nothing to do with it.

issue.title: Check to see whether the cache driver(redis/memcache(d)) is supported when it is initialized

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body: When setting a cache driver(redis/memcache(d)) but it isn't supported on the web server, the server will return "fatal error". So we need check whether the cache driver is supported when it is initialized.
